categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: In 14 BBY, an Imperial officer served as a liaison officer for Moff Wilhuff Tarkin's task force during its ambush of the Carrion Spike. During that incident, the officer was stationed on the force's CC-7700 frigate.
The officer first appeared in James Luceno's 2014 novel Tarkin.
